name: START
text:
This is the beginning of your adventure!
When you make choices, the button will pulsate or glow.
When it does that you can just sit and jam out while the rest of the band get their shit together.
The whole vibe of this is to demonstrate the gapless, seamless audio transitions,
so it still sounds like you're listening to a complete song. [[BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE]]

name: BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE
text:
Wow look a saloon bar! You can hear a band playing a set inside.
The guitarist sounds cool, but the drummer sounds like he's not really doing much.
You should go yell drunkenly at someone to take a solo.
But who? [[GUITAR SOLO]] [[DRUM SOLO]]

name: GUITAR SOLO
text:
As you walk in you slam a whiskey and yell
"PLAY A GUITAR SOLO YA SCRAP HEAP"
The dude tries but it doesn't actually sound that good.
A few mistakes.
Maybe hassle the drummer instead?
[[DRUM SOLO]]

name: DRUM SOLO
text:
"HEY DRUMMER YOU SLACK BASTARD SHOW US WHAT YOU GOT" Heck yeah this drummer is sick!
Surely the band could get a bit heavier though.
Or maybe this piano player could lighten up the mood with some honky-tonk?
[[LETS GO DOWN]] [[PIANOFY]]

name: LETS GO DOWN
text:
"HEAVIER! HE-VI-ER!! C'MON WIMPS"
The band try to go heavier but as their riff steps down,
the stupid cowboy cyborg gets his circuits scrambled and thinks you want him to literally go down.
So he takes off his guitar and starts digging right into the floorboards and into the dirt using his
guitar as a shovel. What an IDIOT hahahah.
Dammit, he's fucked the whole vibe of this joint.
Do you wanna see if the piano player can lift everyone's spirits again?
or should we follow the robot down this damn hole its digging? [[PIANOFY]] [[DOWN THE HOLE]]

name: PIANOFY
text:
Well it ain't no honky-tonk,
but the ethereal arpeggios this guy is playing is certainly lifting everyone's spirits again
(and by "lifting spirits" I mean people are literally lifting their spirits (whiskey) to their lips
and getting SMASHED)
Whoa wait, who's that guy over there? [[CHECK OUT THE GUY WITH 6 ARMS]]

choices.label: CHECK OUT THE GUY WITH 6 ARMS
choices.next: CHECK OUT THE GUY WITH 6 ARMS

id: CHECK OUT THE GUY WITH 6 ARMS
name: CHECK OUT THE GUY WITH 6 ARMS
text:
Wow this guy appears to be playing the exact same solo on
3 different instruments, that's pretty crazy.
Click around and instantly hear him change instruments. This dude is so good.
You can sit and jam out with this psycho
OR you can leave the saloon if you want. Totally up to you.
[[LEAVE THE SALOON]]

name: DOWN THE HOLE
text:
It's so dusty down here,
what the hell is this drunken robot cowboy doing?
It keeps digging, digging, digging.
[[KEEP DIGGING?]] [[NAH]]

name: KEEP DIGGING?
text:
The Cowboy Robot keeps digging
and you follow him all the way out!
You're free!
The end I guess... unless you want to go back to the start of the game again?
[[BEGIN YOUR ADVENTURE]]

name: LEAVE THE SALOON
text: Did the audio change nicely? Or did it jolt?
